name: Prison of Word《文字獄》
description:
This game is called "Prison of  Word" or 《文字獄》 in Chinese.

"文字" means "word" in Chinese, and the letter "獄" means prison.

This is a puzzle game where you have to solve puzzles by making sentences. Player makes the sentences by combining the "word cards", and will obtain new word card when the right combination is made. The game now has both Chinese and English versions. Currently, there are two levels in the game. The duration of first level is about 15~30 minutes, and second level is about 90 minutes.

If you like the game, please comment below, I will consider to make the game longer and better.

This game is a proof of concept, I have decided to work on making a fuller version of game. Please stay tuned!
